_comment: DO NOT EDIT: FILE GENERATED AUTOMATICALLY BY PTERODACTYL PANEL - PTERODACTYL.IO
name: KitsuneLab CS2 Egg @ K4ryuu
author: k4ryuu@icloud.com
description: The SteamRT3 Platform image for Pterodactyl CS2 servers is packed with numerous features, designed to simplify server management and reduce hassle.

variables.name: Prefix Text
variables.description: Custom text for cosnole prefix. Default: KitsuneLab

variables.name: Allow Tokenless Servers
variables.description: Internal setting to allow servers to run without GSLT token.

variables.name: Source AppID
variables.description: NOT VISIBLE TO USERS. DO NOT EDIT.

variables.name: Max Players
variables.description: The maximum number of players the server can host.

variables.name: Validate Install
variables.description: Toggles SteamCMD validation of game server files. Set to 0 to disable.

variables.name: Game Server Login Token (GSLT)
variables.description: The Steam Game Server Login Token (GSLT) used to publicly list your server. Optional, but recommended for increased visibility and access to additional features. Learn more: https://steamcommunity.com/dev/managegameservers

variables.name: Map
variables.description: The default map for the server.

variables.name: MetaMod:Source
variables.description: Base plugin framework required by CounterStrikeSharp. Compatible with all frameworks. Auto-enabled if CSS is selected. Automatically updates on server restart while enabled.

variables.name: CounterStrikeSharp
variables.description: C# scripting platform for CS2 plugins. Requires MetaMod:Source (auto-enabled). Compatible with SwiftlyS2. Incompatible with ModSharp. Automatically updates on server restart while enabled.

variables.name: SwiftlyS2
variables.description: Standalone C# framework for Source Engine 2 servers (no MetaMod required). Compatible with CSS. Incompatible with ModSharp. Automatically updates on server restart while enabled.

variables.name: ModSharp
variables.description: Standalone C# scripting platform with .NET 9 runtime. Compatible with MetaMod only. Incompatible with CSS and SwiftlyS2 (auto-disabled if enabled). Automatically updates on server restart while enabled.

variables.name: Allow Prerelease Updates
variables.description: Allow downloading prerelease/beta versions of frameworks (CSS, SwiftlyS2, ModSharp) from GitHub. Warning: Prereleases may be unstable.

variables.name: Console Filter
variables.description: Filter unwanted console messages. Configure filter patterns in /egg/configs/console-filter.json

variables.name: Custom Parameters
variables.description: Custom startup parameters to add to the command line.

variables.name: Auto Cleanup
variables.description: Automatically cleans up old logs, demos, and backup files. Configure cleanup intervals in /egg/configs/cleanup.json

variables.name: VPK Sync
variables.description: Host directory path containing centralized CS2 game files for syncing. Enables VPK symlinking for massive storage savings. Requires Pterodactyl mount configuration (documentation on GitHub). Leave empty to disable.

variables.name: GDB Remote Debug Port
variables.description: GDB remote debugging port for IDA. Specify port number (e.g., 27130) and allocate it in network settings. Connect: IDA → Debugger → Remote GDB debugger. Performance impact: ~5-10%. Leave empty to disable. Development only!
